Summary: Red and white lights in tree hovering they move then lightening fast shoot up in sky to form 2 large craft
divs: sighting detailswas watching orbs of red and white light fly behind tree and hover and blink, suddenly 2 of the white orbs began moving slowly they went down and up so fast it startled me..i folled them with the camera.. they zoomed up in the sky in no time and formed 2 large craft. all caught on video. i have posted the video on youtube and it can be found here http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=oafkq4ff6ak . there were 2 additional craft they joined up with hovered for a bit and flew east over brush mountain. i have been taping unusual craft doing bizarre things above brush mountain and in the cathedral\downtown area of altoona since november. several people over altoona are witnessing these events as well.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Altoona
There were no other sightings in Altoona on or around December 24th 2009
